subject: Football
Domestic Violence
Ethics and Official Misconduct
Video Recordings, Downloads and Streaming
lead_paragraph: An investigator tasked with sorting out the N.F.L.’s handling of the Rice case will want to be as thorough as possible and not appear in any way craven to his employer.
